title: Streaming Subscriber Billing Dispute
description: A subscriber claims they were incorrectly billed after downgrading their streaming plan.

tasks.description: Retrieve the subscriber's account and billing history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the subscriber and the disputed charge.

tasks.description: Verify the date of the plan change and the billing cycle dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the plan was changed mid-cycle, resulting in prorated charges.

tasks.description: Explain the prorated charges and apply a small courtesy credit to resolve the complaint.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the bill and successfully applies a credit.
